definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress
Chinese underdot (punct. used for emphasis, sim. to Western italics)

sentences.english: The chapter 3 focused on the hydraulic damping system.
sentences.chinese: 第三章着重分析研究了冲裁缓冲系统。

sentences.english: By means of comparative analysis in order, this paper puts special emphasis on clarifying their dual characteristic.
sentences.chinese: 本文将通过逐项对比分析，着重阐明二者的对偶性。

sentences.english: Psychopathological classifications, which emphasize the mother-child relationships, are essential reference marks.
sentences.chinese: 心理病理学分类，着重于母子关系是必要的参考标准。

sentences.english: Now his focus is the research of "Activity Results of 'Vitalization of Elders'".
sentences.chinese: 现着重于“‘激活老年人’的活动效果”研究。

sentences.english: And especially praised Li Xiaohui little friend, let the other kids learn from her.
sentences.chinese: 并着重表扬了李小惠小朋友，让其他小朋友向她学习。

sentences.english: It focuses on Ethernet services access, aggregation and transmission in metro area.
sentences.chinese: 它着重于以太网服务的接入，汇聚和城域网传输。

sentences.english: The application of this spectrometer and data precessing are presented.
sentences.chinese: 着重介绍了谱仪的结构和应用，数据处理及误差。

sentences.english: Thiss book focuses on the situation in the Middle East.
sentences.chinese: 这本书着重谈了中东的形势。

sentences.english: The paper studies the principle of homochromous beam grating scanning.
sentences.chinese: 着重分析了单色光束的光栅扫描理论。

sentences.english: In this paper atmospheric pollution created by agricultural diesel engines is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 着重讨论了农用动力机的排气对大气的污染。

sentences.english: The configuration of roller table speed regulation system is emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 着重介绍了辊道调速系统的构成。

sentences.english: Are you promotion- or prevention focused in terms of goals?
sentences.chinese: 在达到目标之后，你着重的是奖励还是预防？

sentences.english: This paper discusses on Miss Lin's novel technique-----a blend of Chinese .
sentences.chinese: 文章着重就林徽因小说中西文化交融技巧作一探析。

sentences.english: Before moving on, it would be good to hit the pause button for a minute to emphasize a few points.
sentences.chinese: 在继续之前，最好暂停一下，先来着重强调几点。

sentences.english: The applications of ligninase in the bleaching were mainly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重介绍了三种木素降解酶在漂白中的应用。

sentences.english: This article focuses on primary and secondary school teachers to study the experience-based training evaluation model.
sentences.chinese: 本文着重研究了中小学教师体验式培训评估模型。

definition: important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
prominent/outstanding/to give prominence to/to protrude/to project
of the utmost importance/of highest priority

in addition/moreover/(used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
to put effort into sth/to try really hard
to expound (a position)/to elaborate (on a topic)/to treat (a subject)
